author: Monica Alba
title: Trump friend Stanley Chera dies from coronavirus complications
description: A friend and donor to President Donald Trump who the president had said was in a coma and seriously ill after becoming infected with the coronavirus has died.
content:
WASHINGTON President Donald Trumps personal friend and New York real estate mogul Stanley Chera died on Saturday from complications of coronavirus, according to a source close to the Trump family.
While the president never mentioned the name of his friend wh… [+1185 chars]
